keyword: how many calories in an eggo waffle
title: How Many Calories in an Eggo Waffle?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in an eggo waffle, including carbs, protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in an Eggo Waffle?
assumptions: Standard Eggo Homestyle frozen waffle (about 59g), toasted without added toppings; original recipe, no gluten-free or specialty variants.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by Eggo flavor, batch, toasting method, and toppings; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One toasted Eggo waffle provides ~90 kcal with 17 g carbs and 2 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Eggo waffle?
faqs.a: About 90 kcal for a standard toasted Homestyle Eggo waffle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in an Eggo waffle?
faqs.a: Roughly 17 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 4 g sugars per waffle.

faqs.q: Is an Eggo waffle high in protein?
faqs.a: No, it has about 2 g protein per waffle; pair with toppings for more.

faqs.q: How does sodium compare in Eggo waffles?
faqs.a: One waffle has ~190 mg sodium; varies slightly by flavor.

faqs.q: Do different Eggo flavors change calories?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”e.g., blueberry adds ~10 kcal, mini waffles are lower per serving.
